title: Which blogs don't require too much content to write? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s not that much easy to get in first place, with little content. I can say if a person concentrating his business on specific city around and he has owns “plumbingsworks.in”. If he wrote best holiday plumbing tips for “his city name” for “current year”. If the local city having the search intent to look for the particular tips, then his page will rank. Even though he has not that much content. It’s purely regarding the niche you are selecting. There so many blogs are ranked without backlinks. So my point is it depend on topic, how you deliver, LSI, search intent etc. By Shiju Discoveryourblog.com

It depends on the nature of blog pieces been posted out there. Generally blogs which don’t require much researched information and has been created for the purpose of self, creative needs and entertainment.
